arguments.name: Dark Mode Feature
arguments.description: Implementation of dark mode UI theme across the application.

arguments.name: Dark Mode Implementation
arguments.problem_statement: Add a dark theme to the application that can be toggled by users, ensuring visual consistency across all UI components and maintaining accessibility standards.
arguments.success_criteria: All UI elements support a dark mode variant with correct contrast ratios; user toggle works reliably; no regressions in performance or layout on major platforms (Web, iOS, Android).
arguments.description: Implementation of dark mode UI theme across the application.

results.task_name: Break down a feature into tasks

arguments.name: Implement User Notifications
arguments.description:
End-to-end implementation of user notifications for workunit updates including:
- Real-time push notifications via WebSocket or server-sent events
- Email/SMS notification service integration
- Notification preferences UI in the user profile
- Audit trail and delivery status tracking
- Security & privacy compliance (GDPR, CCPA)
- Scalable backend services (message queue, worker pool) with monitoring
- Frontend components for viewing notifications and managing settings
arguments.success_criteria: All notification channels (push, email, SMS) are reliably delivered with correct status tracking. Users can opt-in/opt-out per channel and view a history of sent notifications. System supports scaling to 10k+ concurrent users with <200ms latency for delivery.

arguments.title: Quarterly audit review
arguments.content: Workunit reviewed during quarterly audit; current status confirmed as active/draft.

arguments.name: Notifications Real-Time Notification Feature
arguments.problem_statement: Implement a real-time notification system for users to receive instant updates (e.g., chat messages, status changes) without polling the server.
arguments.success_criteria: All notifications are delivered instantly via WebSocket connections; no client-side polling is used. The solution supports scaling across multiple servers and handles connection failures gracefully.
arguments.description: Considered alternatives: long-polling, Server-Sent Events (SSE), and pure polling. Chose WebSockets due to lower latency and simpler bi-directional communication for notifications.
